title: What is the default saving path of pictures or videos？ How do I change the path？
answer:
1、When the SD card is available:
      The default saving path for pictures is File Manager/sdcard/DCIM/Camera.
      The default saving path for videos is File Manager/sdcard/DCIM/Camera.
2、When the SD card is not available:
      The default saving path for pictures is File Manager/ DCIM /Camera.
      The default saving path for videos is File Manager/ DCIM / Camera.
3、The path can not be changed. If the SD card is available, the files are saved in SD card as default. Otherwise, the files are saved in phone memory.
